question: Kalamandalam Geethanandan, the acclaimed Ottanthullal artist has passed away. He hailed from which state?
explanation: Kalamandalam Geethanandan (58), the acclaimed Ottanthullal artist, has passed away while performing at Avittathur Mahavishnu Temple in Avittathur, Kerala on January 28, 2018. He, who performed on more than 5,000 stages across the country, was also a tutor of Ottanthullal at Kerala Kalamandalam for decades. He had acted in many films, including Mohanlal\'s Kamaladalam.
